part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A creature of immensity mounts the upper eyeline and radiates Godlight. Haunches dusted with Spindle glitter support a creature-shape sketched to being by the sentient background radiation of this plane, and wide, banded wings are edged to soar on stellar winds. Finally, irisdual light churning under =pronouns.possessive= tx-glass skin is refracted to the metaspectrum of impossibility and spills out of body in cornu spirals.

part.Name: BlowAwayGas
part.Message: ▶=subject.T= =verb:bat= =subject.possessive= banded wings and blows the =gas= away!

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: ▶circle of light in the chord of {{ehalcodon|Ehalcodon}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Minarets of starburst ejecta from the proto-universe wheel about a zeropoint and blur in the iridescence of a nondeterministic God.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Marble eaters kneel in priestly concordance with the Great Machine, drawing levers and priming hydrants to steer and be steered by the Computed Will. A dais of crystal diodes gives a dashboard view to the churning of geocultures hundreds of thousands of light years away.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶In high relief, folds and knots of sandy hued shapes crown the sapphire surface of the spherical model. The juxtaposition of scales, the proportion of sea to land, and the collective wisdom harnessed to devise such a thing make your head spin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Flanged ursteel anchors secure the tapered ribbon of Gjaus to its low earth point.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A bubbled ribbon of carbon motes lathed to the thickness of paper combs against its anchoring mechanisms and disappears skyward to a tapered nothing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A bubbled ribbon of carbon motes lathed to the thickness of paper combs against its anchoring mechanisms and disappears skyward to a tapered nothing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The viewing frustum fills with a rainbow mosaic of stellar candles, softened by the isles of dust across their impossible gulfs, and winking in fusil motion. As a single vista, the breadth of it staggers the conscious mind, which races to reduce the innumerable pixels to whole and platonic forms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Great shelves of ice melt and feed the sapphire seas, which lap the drifting honeycombs of basalt and lime. Up here, coastline patterns emerge from millions of flowing contours, each of which might harbor a clade of snails, or trees, or rice farmers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶An aura of airy fuzz swirls above the marble, peeling together and dissolving apart in unending seasons, searing sea winds cooling to zephyrous breezes, sequencing the life rhythms of a breathing world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Gigantic fruiting bodies in rich, unearthly hues stick to sponge forks and burp spores. They flit curvewise toward the electrostatic of the Spindle tether and rain down as glitter.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Superellipses of flat, sundrunk conductors tessellate a braided strip that is curved to best catch sunlight and its reflected runoff.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A ribbon of bubbled agate bows northwise and plunges through the well of clouds, blurring with a shelf of slouching landmass below.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶From the shadowed gloam of an understratum tunnel emerges a south-ran bridge across the empyrean, underlit by the sunbeaming oceans below.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Sheets on sheets of highly fibrous composite material are lathed out to a flat and buildable pleat for high orbit poleis.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Squared, fibrous composite rises northwise above the Sheva and offers an angled view from the high mesa to the lower shelves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Beneath the sunning poleis on the surface, unmappable labyrinths of cavernous, hollowed-out fiberstuff seat chiliads of fossilized underculture.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Megastruts are peeled apart and gilded with ropes of frayed composite, all shattered by the violence of time and frozen in the airless vacuum.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Hyperconductive silver underlooms the low strata, bat-like, and beams signal to the churning duffs below.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Long lines of superconductive timber transsect the North Sheva and magnetically levitate movers to skybent stops.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The latching diamond achieves magnetic lock with the legs of a mover palaquin and concludes the ritual of going.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Latches are burst open and magnetic charge flows outwise; mover capture is no longer possible.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The Sheva-wise length of the Spindle tether is clasped in the locking mechanisms of the arrival chamber. Stabilizing pounders beat their gongs and smooth vibrative aberrations from the Shevas' geolocked orbit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A shouldered arch and gate reify the flow from terrestrial tree and sand to star perch, and vice versa. In the orchard of passage, at the foot of the gate itself, great slabs of ancestral shale ring the vessels of ceremony.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A shouldered arch and gate reify the flow from terrestrial tree and sand to star perch, and vice versa. In the orchard of passage, at the foot of the gate itself, great slabs of ancestral shale ring the vessels of ceremony.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The sinnorot intersect at a middle point and, plied by their golden ecliptics in the Blue Shul, heave movers to and from the heart of the North Sheva.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The beldam district has had its dustcloud fins welded to the superstratum and mazed with labyrinthite to protect the hyperbrain. Inside that electromagnetic cage and quantum temple, the stirrings of the Great Siach spill from its nondeterministic core.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Muqarnas spill down the high dome that once roofed the navel of the thousand starfolk road. Now singing bells sound through the hippodrome with no creaturely answer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The spire-garden of outworld lime fired in the exhaust of starships looms over the low dacha. O'er tiers of antipodal colonnades, pond lilies creep up bannisters and peek at themselves. This is a place of portals.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Slow-turning gears of star-won metal are curtained in sails and flank an abacus of continental measure. The oil burns to light the functional temple, which doubles as synagogue to the 72-Fold Peace and, too, engine of its dictates.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Tall spars of the light-shunting massy stuff were erected o'er starports across the local cluster; the ley lines were bent and new channels of fluidic culture wrought.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Great, void-poking piers are freckled with starship hangars and crosshatched by crumbling marble boulevards. The jeweled cosmos shines through quarter-sphere domes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A cyclopean drum of divining liquid is yoked to the stratum for peering at the mythopoetic event stream of the bubbled kingdom.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶For what purpose did the Eaters rear a fairy tale people and let them think their pennant flew over the whole of a crystal universe? If there was one, it is lost.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Motes of stardust rain through the canopy of enchantment and swirl on wind. They refract the bubbled light and slip into unseen colors, pattering trees of damp and softest leaf.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The skin of the sacred lake dampens the sorceral songs of the forest and mirrors the Great Moon, its sapphire seas and continents of ash shivering in watery projection.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The great capsule (overwall and world-skin) holds the kingdom in truth but not in appearance, inverting the relation of the kingdom and its king.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Muraled cisterns hold the great liquid biobanks that preserve chiliads of terrestrial plant life. The phytonic index so engraved both mirrors and predicts the movements of culture; marshdwellers creep up river to chase fertile soil, and then retreat to canyons when the carnivorous clades thrive.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The spiraling triangle finial portrays the flowing asterism that gave the star cluster its prominence. Alpha, Bet, and Dalet emerged from the galactic nucleus and flowered, coursed o'er the same ecliptic tracks of the Great Machine, and sent a minyan of petal-beings to pray/play a future coupling into existence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The spiraling triangle finial portrays the flowing asterism that gave the star cluster its prominence. Alpha, Bet, and Dalet emerged from the galactic nucleus and flowered, coursed o'er the same ecliptic tracks of the Great Machine, and sent a minyan of petal-beings to pray/play a future coupling into existence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The mysterious thought-form woke from a lost current of local sapiance and squat itself a spongey mangrowth in the ultraviolet baths of the surface. It's long since desiccated, the visceral mass time-viced into something more like paper pulp.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The mysterious thought-form woke from a lost current of local sapiance and squat itself a spongey mangrowth in the ultraviolet baths of the surface. It's long since desiccated, the visceral mass time-viced into something more like paper pulp.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The mysterious thought-form woke from a lost current of local sapiance and squat itself a spongey mangrowth in the ultraviolet baths of the surface. It's long since desiccated, the visceral mass time-viced into something more like paper pulp.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The parabolic mitt catches signal from the far breadths of the cosmos and blows it back through the sounding horn.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Terrestrial plants and otherwise thrive in the hothouse bubble, roots kneading through the fibrous strata, leaves peeking sunwise across the void.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Strange growths and other mutations afflict the exposed plantlife, the shattered vacuum glass admitting unfiltered sun, dust, and spore colonies.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Great earth mounds were terraced and planted with crops doctored to voidroot and drink the sun's full spectrum of light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Triumphal warps and market domes trace the paved superstratum valley, where Eaters of the medina and beldam district engaged their circling rituals.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The cambered cottages of the shesh qanim sprouted in tufts as star traffic crowded the low medinas and Eaters urged to spend more time topside.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶As cottages filled the shesh qanim, late topsiders and margin-filling starfolk established homes on the sheva, southwise of the bubble and hugging the paneled-curtained cliff of the northern continent.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The old and circumscribed poleis of the surface stratum were home to the Eater clans and guilds that spilled up Gjaus in the primal eon before the Covenate. Here they hauled their early starfreight and peered at the blue marble they hoisted themselves off of in raw wonder.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Before even the early Eaters peopled the low medina, when the ark was being prepped to seed the far skies with the terrestrial genome, the first poleis rose out of the entheopolitics and mythoprosaic controversies of Gjaus's construction. Somehow, they stand still.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Here rise the syncretic arcades of the great bazaar in starport's lee. The market jammed the profusions of sixty stars into its tented halls: billion-weave rugs, ox-carted macroprocessors, poisonous perfumes, and cold peaches.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The richest of starfolk gifts were kept in vaults of diamondized zetachrome and piped-in stasis field. The perspective from the mover gives no inkling on whether the ionization of time has weakened these spacetime palisades of the Old Bank.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The horn and its great honeycomb of mirrors farm the moist light from the furthest reaches of this dimension and its neighbors. With it, the Eaters peered at the first moments of universal birth, and then eons that preceded.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Machinic cages store raw force sipped from the slipstream and used to reshape local spacetime. Occasionally, amathematical fluctuations allow a pushton to escape and beam a sidewise galaxy right in the core.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Machinic cages store raw force sipped from the slipstream and used to reshape local spacetime. Occasionally, amathematical fluctuations allow a pushton to escape and beam a sidewise galaxy right in the core.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Potential is polarized into a magenta hex mesh and keyed to every strata in the phasic spectrum. Objects are blocked without exception.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A droplet of thixotropic fluid is downpulled to a basin by centripetal force. In synchronization with its spouse-locks, the net effect stabilizes the North Sheva in geostationary orbit and simulates the ambient pressures of 1g.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Quartziferous panels rotate in sharp helices around a magnetic pole. Their mirrored faces reflect particles out of side dimensions and through the weakened pocket of interspace. A fraction of energy is captured.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The shape of the carved megalith electrifies a forgotten squadron of neurons in a crawlway of your mind, launching you into sudden intimacy with the deep past, somewhere on the cusp of first thought. Then an uncertainty obtains as to which direction on the braid of time you are remembering.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The holy colophon is held on triangular display and approached for ritual and idolatrous reflection in cycles of primes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Star slag from the early age of the cosmos burns in hues of orchid and indigo.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Star slag from the early age of the cosmos burns in hues of leaf and malachite.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Azzurum was starsailed from an andromedan quarry, tempered with chrome, and carved to the ritual shape of the chiber to buttress the vault of heaven.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Melted sand from thirty sun-worlds was blown to topological improbability and capped with finials of starless gold.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Starfire ikons skip on a board of holographic bronze.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Starfire ikons skip on a board of holographic bronze.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Starfire ikons skip on a board of holographic bronze.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Rainbow photons finish the million-year marathon here at the low-wise pressures of emptiness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Sand was abraded from un-stone at a pressure farm in orbit to a neutron star, crush-fired in starship exhaust, and molded into unbreakable lucent panes. They offer a view of the star-ribboned void while also protecting from it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A matchlock beam traces the silhouettes of creatures recently impressed on leylines and scrambles the sampling to produce a true random result. Thousands of years and centillions of bits pass through a choke point of the holographic now, and then are evanesced into one.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A great curved and flanged length of metal replicates the layout of the Witch Court on its three-handed sculptor species's steaming earth. There and under a quincunx moon, rhapsodes of war are locked in ceremonial combat.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: ▶This weapon has multiple grips that change its weapon type.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Continents of texture over the vessel's surface are artifacts of the alien hand, where the clay was thrown in the hearth of a misty otherworld, before being stripped of its gravitational hair.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A spindle of air-chugging greenculm mounts an unseen topological space and shoots stardrunk chips into its crevices.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A crown of bright and dripping star leaves casts mesmerizing shadows across its roots.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Cultured patinae grow in whittled grooves across the doors of star bronze. Inset on joined halves is a gigantic jeweled sphere, with islands of agate on drifting seas of turquoise. The myriad ways of being are depicted on the panel margins in high relief: Eaters lift and lower chains to the star-ribboned sky, swallow stardust, and cartwheel ritual to the vaporous rim of existence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Cultured patinae grow in whittled grooves across the doors of star bronze. Inset on joined halves is a gigantic jeweled sphere, with islands of agate on drifting seas of turquoise. The myriad ways of being are depicted on the panel margins in high relief: Eaters lift and lower chains to the star-ribboned sky, swallow stardust, and cartwheel ritual to the vaporous rim of existence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The sound bow of gleaming star bronze was cast against the perfect mouth of a rotachthon and inset with a zetachrome clapper. When tolled, the sound wave shifts in juxtaposition with the listener's subjective experience, and the rituals of being and going are announced.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Light gleams off carved ornamental cisterns, well-shapes designed to keep liquid fresh and fluidic. The chrome ore they are wrought from was shunted toward an observer's frame and locked in color by a stasis engine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A chute of superconductive timber is keyed to rhyme with adjacent leylines and furnish a frictionless glide.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Goldleaf digits of a nondeterministic number system are arrayed inside the circumference of an ecliptic mosaic.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A vase of starry rose gold floats above the ground and is buffeted by a bouquet of crystal stems. Taken all together, the pipework-of-art evokes a sunning swan.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Bursts of coral and treelife from the outer rim of worlds crawl up the palanquin's magnetized legs and toward its golden roof. Chimes ring at the ritual of going, and fruited smoke pours from its portals.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶An exit reacquaints the mover with the artifice that is a still world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A lens of glass has crusted over the smooth stone where the heat of sacred math burned the air then cooled in Q.E.D. Under that dermis and the meteoritic layer, an electric heart grinds on the starfield of magnets and blinks in geospatial submission.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Hotstar bronze cybernetically set on a layer of living mesoderm assumes a pleasing and space-filling tessellation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A wide wooden sitter offers sufficient room for the cybernetically grown rump or a psychochemically shrunken pair or an ontologically crunched triple.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶An arched sofa brings movers together via the blunted tyranny of here and now. The wooden seat, cut from tree-things on a Coven moon world, bears a notch of some form made by every sitter in its hundred chiliad history.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Bright sun-iron fused in the collision of neutron stars has been incised with rhombic smoking windows and fit over a crucible of burning seed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A constellation of bells cast from the local cluster's different lustrous hardrocks gives sonic depth and range to the mover rituals.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Black grates kindled by the light of the jeweled cosmos are stamped in dust with the hoofprint signatures of six hundred worlds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Broad panels of stardyed metal enclose the starship hangar and act as palimpsests to ten hundred alphabets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Undulant sods finger the air thirstfully and secrete a wax meant to protect themselves from the poison flares of their far-flung dwarf sun.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The vine's spirals squeeze against the pressure of a hidden eigth dimension of space (which only activates outside the density of the strangefluid they're used to being submerged in). When this happens, their cross-spits of solid argon grouse at a frequency that cankers all known earth metals.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Fulcrete, metal, and foam bands protect against the vacuum of space and offer pleasing visual texture to the flat interior, which keeps the heart high on long hauls.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A wood-carved hollow in the geometric bulkhead is circled with blankets and curtained with patterned textiles. In the long void between stars, gently rocked by the juddering of the hedron engine, shipfolk attain tiers of peaceful sleep unknown to onworlders.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A wood-carved hollow in the geometric bulkhead is circled with blankets and curtained with patterned textiles. In the long void between stars, gently rocked by the juddering of the hedron engine, shipfolk attain tiers of peaceful sleep unknown to onworlders.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Planks of oak cut from the trees of a rainy beryl world are nailed into the bulkhead. Floor cushions at its base offer a plush and low view on the rainbow spines of codices, each a portal to a far-flung corner of the universe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Planks of oak cut from the trees of a rainy beryl world are nailed into the bulkhead. Floor cushions at its base offer a plush and low view on the rainbow spines of codices, each a portal to a far-flung corner of the universe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The self-plucked feathers of a mountain moa were stuffed into a velvet cushion thousands of years ago and sold at the bazaar of Samech some time after.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Rich, rain-fed oak was hewn and nailed at simple angles. The surface presents a grained canvas for the organization of thought in the quiet reaches of space.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A seat of rich, rainfed oak was crafted by a master chairmaker in a farworld hilltown and angled to provide the ideal blend of starview contemplation and downturned focus.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The glass lune exhibits spiraling arms and the endless sluices that course between them. Pinchers, sliders, whistlers, and dials array the bezel and provide navigation affordances across the manifold.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Diagnostics of ship and star belt down the glass lune and into data banks. An array of flips, swipes, and precision spheres flank the dashboard on curved panels and provide query affordances across the manifold.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A retractible hex panel is fit on oiled tracks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The seat cushions are vinyl-cocooned in the hue of a frozen ocean spilling free from tidal heat. Control dials, sliders, and switches grid the flat-paneled armrest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The seat cushions are vinyl-cocooned in the hue of a frozen ocean spilling free from tidal heat. Control dials, sliders, and switches grid the flat-paneled armrest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Seat foam is pressed with weird backprints, painted with a dozen blends of sweat, and balanced on a metal dais.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A stanchion of bronze or bronze-like is bent into the characteristic spiraling triangle of a neighboring cluster. Gold patina shrouds it in cryptic and poetic patterns.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Slink-green plant lobes splay out of the ancient cauldron with chromium incision. They live and breathe like their loam-bound cousins, but their bio-data was spliced with the amaranthine seed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Slink-green plant lobes splay out of the ancient cauldron with chromium incision. They live and breathe like their loam-bound cousins, but their bio-data was spliced with the amaranthine seed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The magnetic torch smolders inside the hedron with the offgases of high fusion, and the chamber rattles with potential.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Across a field of vacuum glass and chrome diodes blink in hedronic sequence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Vacuum-safe foamwood beams with the lingering scents of myrrh, star porcelain, and snow-powdered peaches.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A metal support pillar is nicked with the scars of freight scrapes, hedron shrapnel, plasma shells, and bunk beetle bites.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A triad of corded wires hang from a swivel, each headed by a six-way speaker. Static in different octaves pours into the soundscape.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Papyraceous crysteel tissue sways in soft waves and aerates the carousel interior. The enclosure gives the impression of being inside an island fish.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Sucker disks shooting out the wheel of Qv like moist hands clutch the papery gills of the carousel, and thick slimy water pools beneath them. The parasitic burden has the walls panting and wheezing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A panel of tone bars at harmonic ratios shine in sculpted blue light. The space hums with the residual input schema of past flights.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Audiovisual depictions of the moisture manifold splash over the panel's holographic surface. A small and gentle null melody sounds from the underlight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A perfect circle of mossbed parts in a sine wave and grants in/out access to opposing darknesses.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Spinning lunes at counter heights provide concentrative posture for a variety of body geometries.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Spinning lunes at counter heights provide concentrative posture for a variety of body geometries.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A flowing shoulder of outworld lime ends in a flat, object-bearing head. The stone-flute creature depicted grants an eyeless stare.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Rich, rain-fed oak was hewn to a curiosity cabinet with shelves of all sizes. The vaulted chest is now a hundred-world bazaar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The piccoloed orb of cosmic heft houses a watergoo of starbrightness. The substanace streams against the glass, sea-like, in one moment and then clonks to the bottom the next. It gives off an air of subatomic malaise.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A terrarium is colonized by humidifying mosses and algae thriving in the darkling carousel. A single, tipped stem arcs out and offers a smoking puff from the life-rich soup.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Outworld moss clades form ribboned patterns concretizing their unknowable social dynamics. They hang in an orb from a ceiling clutch and in their starfarer landlords spark wonder.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The carousel respiratory system is embedded in a wider network of biomechanical feelstuffs. Some confluence of its nodes have decided to grow a stemlike twine that supports a pinkish, seeing eye. Diagnostics confirm that looking around calms the ship down.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A blinding network of homesuns flicker in parallactic motion. Their systems are joined in the manifold by trade routes, shifting sovereign borders, and the convergence of galactic clusters. Smaller ligatures denote the personal notes of a vast travelogue, turning the whole picture into a hyperdimensional narrative.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A special caste of greensmith peopled the lower medinas of crysteel blast furnaces, where they'd siphon the still-soft metaling and braid artisan batches with their own gloved hands. Adaptation to tidal heat meant they could not return to the surface to witness the employment of their creation, but moon-time rituals bestowed them a precognitive sense for what would become of it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Sheets of manufactured gold carved to a citylike byzantium channel current with negative resistance. Vast archways of bright tracery buffer the computing core of the Ark, assimilating inbound electrons into the sparkwall and shielding the inner sanctum from electromagnetic disturbance.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Outworld wood of searing crimson forms the maze hedge and trellis to an evergrowths.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Chromodynamic flowering over the packed dimensions of multi-spacetime is viewed through a uniprism. The coercion of a petal-pruned viewing angle produces something analogous to a computation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A jellified torus provides the ideal topological surface for the slippage and glomming of tracked information.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Across a field of vacuum glass and zetachrome diodes blink in gyres.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Great epiphenomenal domains are invented, interpreted, and tokenized as language to relay the well-being of the nondeterministic core.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Laser heads trace the actuation of spiral galaxies and burn holograms onto platters of dark matter.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Gusts of crystallizing normality are forced out the exhaust vents to keep the computing cores free and phenomenologically pliable.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶If a machine spins up and down a world in sufficient haste, there are qualia begot that can be sampled but cannot be modeled.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A switch aligns the particle scatter on the far circle and shines an incising light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Scattered points arrange to recorded positions and bloom in the theater of light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The bright countenance and mane of short quills on the young urshiib cut through even a canvas of fraying light. His shoulders are drawn back with fresh purpose, and his eyes pierce the foreground with a laser's precision.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A depiction coheres of the explosive energy of the universe bottled in a shielded bulb and pistoned into a vast and edged intelligence. From there the great machinic archons of the Eaters fissioned in their oracula and, with baetyls as fingers, lathed the waking world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The gown floweth over small shoulders, and a sidewise veil gives glitching shape to a face tilted at the angle of anonymity. At last and freed from the lace of its cuff, a hand is moted like a sorcerous lamp, and shines in fairness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A drape flows off his shoulder with mythoprosaic inevitability, and the digital dyad implies both sanative peace on earth and congruity with the vault of heaven.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A curtain of blue, magenta, and scarlet hangs over the sacred hold of moon-and-sun shade and hypernova gold (color specifications handed down directly from the machinic being who ensued from the entheos within). Raw amateriality is titrated out the container boundary and canaled in managed doses to processors that crack it in order to do the uncomputable: decide from nothing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Oily skinstuff whorls in eddies of purgatory gray and hardens to diamond at the claws. The shedim were star-toted off their god moon, bargained in one-hundred-year rituals to the machinic archons, and kept as pets. Once history lengthened down the dark well of the sultanate, they were poached to extinction for the milk of their precious irises.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Castle-dwelling wood artisans mimic the forest architecture of gnomes and create a hutch for their tales of outer spheres.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Liedowners at the trailhead of the dreaming dale get lost in the puzzle of marquetry and melt into the seafoam soft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Wood artisans spend their whole life in intimate colloquy with a single tree. Upon their later years, when the rhythms of the Great Moon occupy a larger and larger share of their thoughts, they finally master the art of steam and bend heartwood to their wills.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶No clothespress or cabinet is finished by the sunclock without a secret drawer, where children might keep their fey gifts and find them once more on the night of their death projection.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The mindful curvature of the wizarding surface masquerades as the Worldskin for learning minds who wish to trace the arc of sorcery.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Fairy moss powders the column and renders it damp with rainbow dew. Inside the shade, fey Magicks course in spheric everness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶When a song of power roars out the moted forest and slides up Worldskin, the sidewise veil shields the sorceress's ears and eyes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Microscopic needlework on the sleeve encodes the entire history of the crystal sphere and Great Moon, at least from the fey perspective. In the well of kingdom and castle, the embroidered texture returns the pressure of a gloved hand locked in dance at the masquerade ball.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Raw astrocalcite fused in starship exhaust retains the bio geometries and colorful hues of shelled life. Eventually it will be pressurized and polished down to its masonry form.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Metal cribbed from the blackened nozzle of a starship was melted down by the Exhaustiers' Guild and cast to a monumental scaffold. The silhouettes of fried voidfauna are still visible on the burnished veneer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Metal cribbed from the blackened nozzle of a starship was melted down by the Exhaustiers' Guild and cast to a monumental scaffold. The silhouettes of fried voidfauna are still visible on the burnished veneer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Hyperdimensional scum glistens on the projection disc from when it was doused in the soapy film of interspacetime. The disc is silent now, sundered from its transcendental entanglements, its base offering a shadewall for moss to prosper on.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The stair, stage, and loop gate are cast in marble relief to their surroundings by hyperdimensional filament. The holograph vista of anotherworld temple is evanesced, and instead local lilies fill the frame.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Little decapods of chrome shell traveled the stars as hedron engine parasites, drinking torch runoff and nibbling through conductive line. Now they muse about their retirement garden, having been shot through the nozzle of a decomissioned ship and surfed to the scrapyard.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Five verdurous lobes fall off a star-pointed flower the color of burning exhaust. They float in circles, driven by rhizomatic impulse.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Sharp shoots of outworld crimson lust stab the air from their earthwise glove. When a puff of artificial wind fans them out, they sparkle and hiss.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Furry shrinewart grows over a ring of dead plant stems and drinks in the temple shade.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶From the camber of the tree's twigs and trunk you infer a stellar arrangement of its homeplace too geometrically complex for natural starbirth. =pronouns.Possessive= ribbons throw the light like glass and dance on the stale air, strange pennants of a civilization shorn of familiarity. Here at the edge of =pronouns.possessive= foreign pond, the visitor being root-sips cool water in confounding performance.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Tombed shells peep out from under the inverted loop of lime, carved in rumination of parabolic life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A lens of glass has crusted over the smooth stone, and its kinetic fins have been shorn off at the poles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Spiral-lathed corner pieces of brass secure the bottomside of an old wooden trunk. In the style of its molluskan artisans, the top is left metalless and bare of insignia.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A loop on the pelagic neck was twirled to fit large hands of lime. The vessel smells of wine and myrrh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Thumb smushes on the flared handles and neck show where the potter rushed to spin clay and fire the next order. But the edges of practicality are softened by a slow and berry rich glaze.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Dyed rush and palm fronds were pulled to a westwise weave for storeroom preservation. Its offshoot strands are stained dark apple red.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A pillow dome of goat hair stuffing grants the low and sunwise angles of repose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A great sawed plank of oval-figured wood had been raised on legs and made the feasting board for a whilom king. Then an axe of dispute split it to pieces, and those children were carried off and shaved smooth to supply flatness again.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the thick clay oven, and with it comes the smell of scrumptious food. Its high awning is painted with the honeys and jams of the new season.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A burning Y of dried wood and cupped iron light the domiciles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A burning Y of dried wood and cupped iron light the domiciles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Scrap metals from abroad the table of elements are welded together in sculpture of the mythic features: =body.features=. Old soup and spills of =catalyst= stain its rusted torso, and in the smoldering light its pose evokes the presence of a dying =atzmus.creature=. Iron limbs were beaten to the shape of =armament.skill.snippet=, and at center mass hangs the broken sigil of =hamsa.an=.

part.Name: Interactable
part.Message: ▶=object.Does:are= much too old and rusted to enter.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Possessive= brim leaf flops down like a beaten hat and shades =pronouns.possessive= glowing eyes from the high salt sun. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:wield:afterpronoun= a vinereaper with practiced care around =pronouns.possessive= tender and scythable roots.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Possessive= finger stems have grown to tinkering length, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:tauten:afterpronoun= =pronouns.possessive= roots' grip on the underearth to augment the torque of =pronouns.possessive= wrench turns.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Subjective= =verb:sniff:afterpronoun= the air and =verb:stamp:afterpronoun= =pronouns.possessive= hindroots in the dry soil. Pungent, ochre-toned petals flit from =pronouns.possessive= crown and meadow =pronouns.possessive= broad haunches.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A troop of shrooms have taken symbiotic root in =pronouns.possessive= flower crown. =pronouns.Possessive= stems are singed and peppered with spice, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:stir:afterpronoun= a zesty punch with a wooden ladel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Possessive= verdurous flower crown flows down =pronouns.possessive= shoulders as a sidewise veil, and =pronouns.possessive= finger stems writhe over a glinting cathode.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Possessive= finger stems pop and slide o'er a wooden flute, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:shuffle:afterpronoun= a lateral jig on pleated roots. The petals of =pronouns.possessive= crowning flower shift colors in happy simultaneity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The flowerbeing dons the diodic hood of the Chromaic Church and crackles dry petals together at a hymnal metric. A brooch of polished chrome pinches =pronouns.possessive= foilage at the neck.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A soft, glowing light radiates from =pronouns.possessive= verdurous core, and all =pronouns.possessive= leafy parts camber toward it like a miniature sun. Above, =pronouns.possessive= brights eyes glint with quixotic purpose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A candescent shard of crystal is sat in the core of =pronouns.possessive= flower crown and glows with sightfulness in place of eyes. All about =pronouns.possessive= verdurous body, the air vibrates with a raspy hum.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Possessive= verdurous overgrowth has knit itself to a triangle apron, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:camber:afterpronoun= with a strange and civic purpose. A pair of warm eyes impress conviviality.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Flatten sheets of metal run off a warp beam in reverse and are stripped to loose wire. The bars of the separating reed bzzzz with psychoconductive force.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Ribboned cable is threaded through a drive unit in lemniscate shape and loops with perpetual motion.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶An ocean drum is fit against a drive wheel to force air and electroparticles down a depressurized funnel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A branch trellis of crystalline thorn-hair has been contorted to iconic cross shape. The enterer is forced to become concave.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶It's a richly faceted likeness of the night terror who shunts the fluid seas to dead lattice, who stalactites into other-dreams to vaporize their dreamers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶In every hill hamlet 'neath the clustering horizon, there is a tale spoken of the Jewel Who Came. Much is learned from her or little, but the portraiture of her broad and shining facets remains constant.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A crystal complexity is depicted at the forever moment of shatter. The carving is still and in so being is hyperkinetic, encoding all possibilities in its elisions, and then resolving into none.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A creature of wing, hoof, and spine slouches to the weight of years, tongue tra-la'ing a rich and wistful echo, countenance shining in the bright spectrum of affect. An irisdual grease churns under =pronouns.possessive= translucent skin and beams rainbows that squirrel off in three-dimensional strips. The thing waits unbidden.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A creature of wing, hoof, and spine slouches to the weight of years, tongue tra-la'ing a rich and wistful echo, countenance shining in the bright spectrum of affect. An irisdual grease churns under =pronouns.possessive= mosaic skin (fractalized by =pronouns.possessive= multi-threaded lineage) and beams rainbows that squirrel off in seven-dimensional strips. The thing waits unbidden.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A svelt figure in thousand-year motley prances, and the little tolling bells hanging from =pronouns.possessive= archway cap ding and dong. Waiting for all or none, left alone of =pronouns.possessive= deserted order, =pronouns.subjective= =verb:speak:afterpronoun= with fool's privilege in the undertext of a richer reality.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A cameo of meteorite sardonyx bears an unknown clan sigil in florid script, serifed with tiny gears and sails.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Quills shrank to calcite screws mark the creature in a hex grid, and ears of catholic expressiveness whip up and down like quarks. A commodore's gyroscopic coat remains still as the light sculpture periphery ticks with the subtle movements of life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The darkling crystal was shattered and abraded to dust; a million worlds of self have crumbled.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: ▶{{W|A Tale of Love in Bey Lah}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Several sheets of tattered, age-stained parchment are bound together at the margins by some sort of glue.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: ▶{{W|A Tale of Fear in Bey Lah}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Several sheets of tattered, age-stained parchment are bound together at the margins by some sort of glue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Great spiral horns emerge from a proudly-held head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Subjective= =verb:squat:afterpronoun= low in humble repose, and tufts of colored fur sprout from =pronouns.possessive= cheeks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Shiny plating rubs against the dirt floor, and a whetted tailspike curves in perfect geometry.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Furry ridges catch the long salt wind, and a dextrous tail pounds the ground.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A moss-bloused crystal sphere squats in practiced observance.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Possessive= shoulders slump and the tips of =pronouns.possessive= quills have begun to darken.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Great furry wings beat at bugs on =pronouns.possessive= ear, and then settle across a broad ursine back.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A neck of considerable length shivers gnats away, and =pronouns.possessive= crunching muzzle snaps at the stragglers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The weight of the thick air pushes =pronouns.objective= down onto =pronouns.possessive= stocky dumps.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A metrical purr exits =pronouns.possessive= larynx with ceaseless abidance.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A fidgeting crystal breaks the ambient rays of light with =pronouns.possessive= turning and craning.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The plant puffs up at the presence of another and basks in the soft light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Subjective= =verb:hover:afterpronoun= low to the ground and snips grass in pairs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A shelf of rock has decorated =pronouns.reflexive= with wire, shawls, and beads.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Dirt smears =pronouns.possessive= habit and rust powders =pronouns.possessive= wrench.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Crescent ears perk at a distant howl and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:sniff:afterpronoun= the wind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Subjective= =verb:waggle:afterpronoun= =pronouns.possessive= neck to the stiff rhythms of the wind and shrugs =pronouns.possessive= hump forward.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Possessive= striped flanks draw and then dizzy the eye.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Possessive= eyes pierce the packed soil and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:rub:afterpronoun= clay between =pronouns.possessive= fingers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Tense arms brace =pronouns.possessive= weapon and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:hold:afterpronoun= your gaze with measured doubt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Gorgeous soft ray ribbons off =pronouns.possessive= body and a curious eye peers out =pronouns.possessive= flat head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Wind-nosy stigma and style reach from the pocket of a gallant bloom.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A small creature of the rooted mud hops in pride.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Bright hyphae lick mud off the ground.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Star orchid saliva pools at the tips of =pronouns.possessive= fangs and drips to the ground.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Subjective= =verb:stand:afterpronoun= with a hooved arch and baaaaas proudly at the sky.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A bug-swathed rump of mangy fur sways in peaceful and goatish rhythms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A backlength snood flops in metamorphic caprice as the death/life acolyte skips to the threnodies of star and home.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A salvaged aquarium bubble of kelp-draped glass keeps the hermit at distance from the waking world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Spines made of civilization cartilage have been sculpted to displeasing shapes by the trade winds of outwise dimensions.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A corsage of curls spill over dwarf horns, and there is less tension about =pronouns.possessive= hind hips than most animals.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A papery pair of chitin mosaics beat the thick air, and a glassy bulb segment chatters behind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Wind presses a fringed thawb and neckdress against a human form. The fabric is embroidered to rhyme with patterns in the salt and star-cut sky.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The creature wears the diodic hood of the Chromaic Church, but =pronouns.possessive= field robes bear none of its ceremonial stiffness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A satchel in the thrice-pocketed style of Odrum is sweat-pressed to =pronouns.possessive= back.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A hatchet of blubbery tissue spills out of a machine-scraped bivalve shell.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A soft inner light radiates off =pronouns.possessive= yoked scales and enhalos the ruffled pelerine abouth =pronouns.possessive= neck.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Possessive= tassled cape (braided on the banks of a forgotten river) accents a slim posture of heedful calm.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Possessive= moss fur grows thick (and even fruits), and bright cyan eyes peer out the selfsame mask of =pronouns.possessive= minyan.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A fluent bubble is kept aloft by viscous current trapped in a membrane of glass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Mail banged and brushed in a chiliad of coats weighs the knight down with the burden of kinetic years. The faded rhombus sigiling =pronouns.possessive= helm continues with its insistent metaphysic.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Inverted spirals of sponge-like tissue taste the surface air for some blossoming, subterranean plant.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Stick and spiked pauldron align to the angle of =pronouns.possessive= furry snout, and =pronouns.possessive= ears twitch with an uncanny and familiar joy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Shoulder radars flange and spin to moon time like animated epaulets, and =pronouns.possessive= cask boots trot a machinic gait.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Channeled arms waggle and suck moisture from the thick air, while cracks in =pronouns.possessive= clay pot show a hunger for growth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Weight of the weary years has sagged the tympana of the frogfolk and binded them to the leaf-wet earth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Village life has tilted the pig and worn the hair off =pronouns.possessive= ham ass. As well, =pronouns.possessive= forehooves splay in the signature of metal tool use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The windy lathe of eons has rasped the plastron down to an old and smooth stone, and left the shelled friend with a sour smile.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶=pronouns.Subjective= =verb:have:afterpronoun= been trimmed and moistened with doting care, =pronouns.possessive= pot reglazed in the fashion of Yawningmoon.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A crag-being of hardened clay has hair and grass growing between the pressure cracks on =pronouns.possessive= shoulders and back.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A slitherkin hunkers low to navigate the dales and rents of the small world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Colorful spines are splayed like gear teeth across a doughy and sun-bleached orb.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Two spitting leaf-beaks prune each other's neck and chew the weedmatter into seedpack.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The art of sitting is practiced with the nuance of quantum chromodynamics, among the buoyant caste. Here =pronouns.subjective= =verb:perch:afterpronoun= on =pronouns.possessive= palanquin walker and =verb:drink:afterpronoun= in the nubile realm.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The broad-eye bat flaps a nuisance in the carcass-darkened space.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Rude-meaning time has rolled =pronouns.possessive= annuli to their skinniest form and smushed their segments into one. A rope of dissolving spittle joins =pronouns.possessive= peristomium with the ground.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The sidewise ribbons of late Seeker fashion twirl in the moistening air, and with a gestureless hmmph, =pronouns.subjective= =verb:brush:afterpronoun= the dirt from =pronouns.possessive= cowl.
